#summary Index of usage examples for Cascading.

= Introduction =

Details in using the examples provided as separate downloads.


= Details =

Two sample applications, with source are provided on the left. To give Cascading a quick whirl, download the cascading-alpha archive and one of the example applications. Untar them both into a new directory so that you have a 'cascading' and either 'loganalysis' or 'wordcount' directories in the same parent directory.

Next, you must initialize your local Hadoop environment. For example, call
{{{
export HADOOP_HOME=~/hadoop
export PATH=$HADOOP_HOME/bin/:$PATH
}}}
where `HADOOP_HOME` points to the root of your Hadoop installation.
